songs.title: Everybody Is Crazy
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Ain't looking for a neighbor
Ain't looking for a friend of mine
Silly buddy everyone knows

[Chorus]
Comes easy but
Tell you one thing
Everybody is crazy
Crazy to say I love you

[Verse 2]
Thought I'd talk you down easy
Thought I'd have you sing a part of mine
Silly funny everyone knows

[Bridge]
Comes easy but
Tell you one thing
Every time your makeup runs
I turn up the light on you

[Chorus]
Comes easy but
Tell you one thing
Everybody is crazy
Crazy says I love you
